resources.string: Welcome \nPress Button to get a quote!
In order to succeed, we must first believe that we can. \n-Nikos Kazantzakis
Everything has beauty, but not everyone sees it. \n-Confucius
No excellent soul is exempt from a mixture of madness. \n-Aristotle
Do not dwell in the past, do not dream of the future, concentrate the mind on the present moment. \n-Buddha
An eye for an eye only ends up making the whole world blind. \n-Mahatma Gandhi
The true sign of intelligence is not knowledge but imagination.\n -Albert Einstein
Education is not the filling of a pail, but the lighting of a fire. \n-William Butler Yeats
Education is the movement from darkness to light. \n-Allan Bloom
Every artist has thousands of bad drawings in them and the only way to get rid of them is to draw them out.\n -Chuck Jones
We know only too well that what we are doing is nothing more than a drop in the ocean. But if the drop were not there, the ocean would be missing something. \n-Mother Teresa
